images.caption: Figure 1:Model Performance Comparison. a) Perplexity across different context lengths. Lower perplexity indicates better performance. b) Latency comparison of models at various generation lengths. Taipan exhibits significantly lower latency and superior scaling compared to other strong baselines for longer sequences.
Figure 2:An overview of the Taipan architecture.
